My skills

I'm a 21 year old guy from the Netherlands. I have a MBO degree in game development with Unity and C# but a bit of Unreal with blueprint as
wel. Although that is not my prefered way of development.

 My best programming skills are in object oriented programming. With this I
am most confident in languages like C# and Java. Futhermore I know my way around with languages like Python, C and C++. And while I'll most likely need
a refresher on the languases, I also know PHP and BASIC.

 I am currently a student at Windesheim in Zwolle. With this I have worked
with a small group of student for creating applications. These range from
web-applications, games, as wel as embedded systems.

My hobbies

For hobbies I do a number of things. I collect vintage electronics, mostly consoles. But I also has a handful of old computers. Besides that I enjoy watching movies and series from time to time. Although I watch a lot of things, I mostly watch animation, both American as wel as Japanese.

 Next to that I usually start a number of side projects. This ranges from 3D printing, video editing and Lego modeling. While I usually don't expect much from these projects, sometimes I land work from it (see "My work" page)
